Articles.Content: Ive noticed his threads are closed and there is no support. He left his mod unfinished and stopped at 1.0.2 . Im having an issue where his probes stick into the air on launch. The rocket wont launch b.c. his probes were not coded correctly for 1.0.4 . Does anyone have same problem AND a fix?
I have spoken with him at length. He is still actively working on his stuff, but has taken a passive route. He is letting probus handle the page maintenance while he maintains his stuff.

soulds like a workable approach, i dropped a message on the other thread.
